name: Space Walk
description: In this space game the player steers an astronaut to collect the stray satellite that is roaming in space. To do this he has to avoid or shoot the asteroids and other spacemen. Once it has been collected, the player has to keep his finger on the trigger to take the item to the spaceship. The level is completed when the satellite is inside the ship and the game then moves on to the next level, where the asteroids and other spacemen become a little faster.

releases.country: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom

shot.caption: This screen displays as the game loads
This screen selects the controller options and explains the action keys
A game in progress. The satellite is white. Any other object is effectively a bomb that will explode on contact
Apart from bombs there are baddies who track and shoot at the player's character
Any contact with the ground is also fatal
The satellite is finally under control and is heading towards the shuttle
It's gone! The shuttle's doors are open and the satellite's safely inside
Level 2 ans the satellite is heading to the shuttle again.
Ooops! It missed and that's another life gone! When all lives have been lost the player  returns to the main menu screen
